topics.body:
Louisiana, Mississippi, Texas, Kentucky, Michigan, Ohio, Tennessee, Alaska, Idaho may hear cases on gay marriage by the end of the year and may potentially make a ruling by the end of the year.  Chances are half of those cases will be delayed so even pessimistically speaking we're looking at 35 states legalizing gay marriage by the next year.  The other thing to keep in mind is the court's schedules meaning that they have to hear the cases within a certain amount of time no matter how much they try to delay it.

What does this mean?  My money is on 45 states legalizing it by June 2015.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
